resources.string: Allow me to introduce my self, my full name is Yuni Asmara . just call me Yuni. \n\n I was born in Gunung Sugih 20 june 2000, i live in Gunung Sugih Lampung Tengah.
I study at Muhammadiyah University of Metro, Faculty of teacher training and education, \n english education study program.

Guys, here in the application that I developed, you can learn about procedure text material with questions in the form of audio to practice listening skills, \n the application developed is expected to help to practice listening skills in an enjoy and happy way. Have a good study!!\n
